mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER( MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_MOBILE, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_HEIGHT, MEMBER_WEIGHT, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_GUBUN, MEMBER_ROUTE, MEMBER_PROFILE_PATH, IN_USER_ID, IN_DATE, UP_USER_ID, UP_DATE ) values ( #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberMobile}, #{memberGender}, #{memberHeight}, #{memberWeight}, #{memberEmail}, 'U', 'P', 123, #{memberId}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), #{memberId}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS') )
mapper.select: select count(*) from MEMBER where MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
select count(*) from MEMBER where MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname}
select count(*) from MEMBER where MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
